title: [Bug]: Command-line option '--help' prints with 80 character fixed text width
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

When running "teams-for-linux --help" in a terminal, the help text is always wrapped after 80 characters.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.12.7

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. open a terminal
2. run "teams-for-linux --help"
3. help text wrapped always 80 chars wide, ignoring actual width of the terminal (see screenshot)
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. help text uses available width of terminal for better readability
```

### Debug

```markdown
not applicable
```
